articles.author: Joe Rindl
articles.title: 'History on the line' for Djokovic in Alcaraz final - BBC.com
articles.description: Novak Djokovic says "history will be on the line" when he faces Carlos Alcaraz in the Wimbledon men's singles final on Sunday.
articles.content:
Alcaraz recovered from a nervy start in last year's championship match to beat Djokovic 1-6 7-6 (8-6) 6-1 3-6 6-4.
The 21-year-old, now a three-time major champion, could become the youngest back-to… [+873 chars]
